website_summaries.verdict: Recreational running and training are part of the purposes of the Skechers GOrun 400. This lightweight neutral shoe is meant to keep the runner comfortable, secure and well-cushioned throughout their activities. It’s a reliable running companion and it doesn’t even have a hefty price tag.
pros: The sandwich-mesh upper offers comfort and breathable support to the foot
Synthetic overlays that have been stitched onto the upper support the foot and keep it in place
A padded tongue and collar deliver cushioning to the dimensions of the foot
A lightweight underfoot cushioning system delivers responsiveness and comfortable support
Runners appreciated the inclusion of an insole that’s made to provide additional shock absorption
The rubber outsole has sensors that help the runner achieve better transitions through the gait cycle
cons: Several users find the GOrun 400 to easily wear down, especially the outsole, even only after a few hundred miles
It was narrow in width, according to some runners

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my teenage son. The fit is true to size and they have plenty of width, without being too wide. The sole is the Skechers cushy Go Walk and it's like walking on a cloud. Bought the navy with the light gray sole and it's a nice contrast instead of a bright white. They come with 2 sets of laces, navy and gray. After hearing my son say how comfortable these were and how these are his "go to" shoes now, I would recommend these for anyone looking for comfort and style at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: listen to the reviews!
customer_reviews.text: This my first purchase of the Go Run 400 running shoe. I normally wear a 10.5 or 11 in all of the shoes I wear. I listened to the reviews and purchased a 11.5. I am glad I did because the 11 wold have been too small. That being said, I have not worn a more comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Reginald Cross

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes But a Little Tight
customer_reviews.text: I tried this shoe at our local Kohl's store and found I needed a size 11.5, normally size 11. They only had black so I ordered gray from Amazon. When I first put them on, the length was fine but the width was tight. I have worn them around the house a few times, and think they are stretching a little. They are very comfortable and very light weight. If they were just a little wider I would have given them a five star.
customer_reviews.author: John Dart

customer_reviews.title: small fit
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear size 11. My previous Nike and NB shoes were both size 11 and fit well. So I ordered size 11 Skechers, but had to return them because they were to small. I reordered the next larger size, 11.5. They are also slightly small as well and not as roomy as I expected. I did not want to make another return and order a size 12. So, I will keep them. But I wish they had fit as I expected them to.
customer_reviews.author: James Stone

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value, but COMFY!
customer_reviews.text: I actually loved these shoes--for as long as they lasted-- They are light, extremely comfortable and not as garish as so many manufacturers think we need to have. The problem was/is that the outside of the heel wore out in less than the Summer season, and I don't even run. I can't, I have fused ankles. Both. I have other running shoes that I've worn for twice as long since these gave out and they are just fine and cost a lot less.
customer_reviews.author: Keith944T

customer_reviews.title: I over pronate and these still feel GREAT.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable. I overpronate so a lot of shoes are uncomfortale. I've been a loyal Sketchers GoRun customer since I found the GoRun Ride a few years ago. The Disperse is even more comfortable than the last pair. There was no break in period. They give great support while being light weight and still giving a decent road feel. I walk long distances (8-10 miles at a time) and these have been great.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Reeser

customer_reviews.title: Some of the best shoes on the market
customer_reviews.text: I pretty much wear Skechers exclusively. I am a large man at 225lbs. These shoes are plush and comfortable. I use them for walking more than anything. The Forza line are my chose running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Heeff

customer_reviews.title: These are excellent shoes, although the fit is slightly tighter than ...
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent shoes, although the fit is slightly tighter than I expected. If I were to order them again, I would order a half size larger. With the mesh upper it's not big a deal, just a very snug fit. But the Goga insole cushioning is fantastic. I'm 68 and walk 5 miles every morning on paved surfaces (sidewalks and streets). I've gone through a pair of Asics and a pair of Reeboks over the past 10 months and neither was as comfortable as these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Last long, good support. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. My first pair lasted about 1 and a half years. I walked between 4 and 8 miles a day, 5 days a week. Other walking shoes make my big toe go numb. These are the only shoes so far that provide support for my foot to distribute the load. When I did have to run they provide more bounce in my steps. I would recommend these shoes to anyone always on there feet
customer_reviews.author: Brett K.

customer_reviews.title: Love My Go Run's
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of Go Run 400s I have owned, and I sincerely hope they continue to produce this shoe. I recently returned from a military deployment to the middle east, and I wore out my first pair of Go Runs, and put a serious hurting on the second pair. I couldn't wait to get another pair as soon as I returned home, as they are without a doubt the most comfortable running shoe I have ever worn. No break in time, just put them on and go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very very comfortable. Shoe is surprisingly well made for a value ...
customer_reviews.text: Very very comfortable. Shoe is surprisingly well made for a value brand like Skecher. Normally I buy under armour or Nike sneakers but this shoe is very comparable to both brands.
customer_reviews.author: Frankito

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good for the money. The sole is very soft rubber so I don't think they will last very long. My only gripe is that the stitching on the left shoe wasn't done very well and there is a slight "stretch" to the fabric on the seam of the sole and the top where my big toe is. VERY comfortable shoe though, especially while running (what I bought it for).
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Wore for two gym visits and so far they feel great. Fit was just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Just received them a few days ago. Wore for two gym visits and so far they feel great. Fit was just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Walker

customer_reviews.title: loved an earlier version of this shoe...
customer_reviews.text: i've pretty much gone to wide toebox minimalist brands but an earlier version of these were also adequate. this 400s iteration, waaay too narrow toebox and these are uncomfortable in general with thick stiff materials compared to the earlier version i cant seem to find anymore.
customer_reviews.author: KNEADaTENSION

customer_reviews.title: Light but tight.
customer_reviews.text: Nice light shoes, and normally I take a size 8 in most sketchers, but these were a bit snug - probably should have gone up a half size. Other than that it seems like a nice shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Joemc

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I'm a mailman and needed a comfortable shoe to walk my route. These are the most comfortable shoes I've ever owned. The soles don't last long and the side is already torn on both shoes but for the price I can expect to replace them every 5-6 months. I'll continue buying them for their comfort, cause they are still as comfortable as the day I bought them 5 months later
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Run With It!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Good fit. I love these shoes. I "run" and they more than meet my needs. Easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: friendlyface316

customer_reviews.title: I did not like the style of show
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the style of show. I just had received the GoMEB Razor and was expecting something close to that style. The 400 was not nearly on par with the performance of the razor. I returned and bought another older version of the MEB.
customer_reviews.author: Goose

customer_reviews.title: Wears Out Quickly
customer_reviews.text: My son likes this shoe and said it was comfortable, however, after 2 months it is completely broken down. There is no support in the side of the shoes at all anymore. He wore them 4 days a week on average.
customer_reviews.author: CTF Mom

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: Wow these shoes are amazing. so much comfort and feels like i have a spring in every step i take while running. the shoe itself looks sleek. the best part of all this is as soon as i put them on and did my 3 miles i shaved 6 min of my run time, no joke that is how much comfort this shoes have. i had to order another pair in full black.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe if you like your shoes padded
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the fit and feel of these shoes. He’s tried several other brands, but keeps coming back to these. They don’t last him long, but nothing does, as he seems to be very hard on shoes. He says these are very comfortable, with lots of padding.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Thayer

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable and affordable sneakers.
customer_reviews.text: These are very very very comfortable. And the heel feels good. I will use these for running and everyday things. They also look great as well. This brand is definitely very good. Cost: $37
customer_reviews.author: Ilyooshinka

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and good looking but runs small
customer_reviews.text: Liked the sneakers but run small. Sending back for half size larger than I usually take. Editing my review now that the half-size increase was made. Good looking and comfortable sneaker. Great even when on my feet all day.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Warren

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable but a bit too big. Next time I will purchase in person, since the sizing was not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyR

customer_reviews.title: For Serious Walking
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes right before a trip to Walt Disney World...over 100 miles of walking later, they still look great and feel comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Keep your toenails trimmed
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to be good the first few months but my big toe wore through the top of the shoe. I should my toenails more often, but I didn't wear these enough for that to happen so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Reliable seller and product according to the description. I recommend it

customer_reviews.title: One size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Sketchers go Run usually are one size small. So order one size bigger. But the Meb are exact size you wear usually to be careful.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but did not fit me right
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but did not fit me right, had to sell them and reorder new one. So if you are wearing size 10 make sure you order size 11. Other than that, nothing to complain about, very comfortable for running and gym time.

customer_reviews.title: But these shoes look good and have a nice sole
customer_reviews.text: Skechers need to get their sizing standardized. Some shoes size 11mens US is EU45 and for other shoes, US11 is an EU 44.5. But these shoes look good and have a nice sole.great for. Walking.

customer_reviews.title: Great feel and comfort
customer_reviews.text: They fit wonderfully. I can feel the shoes conforming to my feet. The cushioning is wonderful. I walk multiple miles in them daily and I never have any soreness in my feet.

customer_reviews.title: disappointed with the fit, but liked the materials and feel

I liked the bottoms as I had similar style in the past. if the fit would have cooperated, i would have kept them.

customer_reviews.text: Smaller for my feet. It felt comfortable to walk though. Would fit for narrow feet. Usual size that I buy from the same brand was smaller for my feet. I ended up returning it.

customer_reviews.title: Realy comfortable. Super light.
customer_reviews.text: Have had go walk 3 shoes for about a year and love them. Needed a lace up and decided to try these. Great choice. Super light, super comfortable. Time will tell if they wear as well.

customer_reviews.title: I like the shoes and would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes and would by them again, just bigger. The shoes are not the problem, rather I mis-estimated how big my feet swell during jogging. So that was on me. I do not like the laces, so I bought some "lock laces" and love it.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite sneakers.
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps the most comfortable pair of sneakers I have ever owned. Light with great cushion. Definitely going to buy more color options. Giid price too. Quick delivery.

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable, My old shoes were almost three years old ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered my regular size of 9 and the shoes fit perfectly. They are very comfortable, My old shoes were almost three years old and I feel a huge difference wearing these new shoes, they offer much support and comfort. Very glad I bought these.

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit but ok
customer_reviews.text: Fits very tight at first but stretches out after awhile. Now fits very snug but, comfortable. Walk in them 4 to 5 times a week.

customer_reviews.text: Used to only wear Nike, for 30 years, now I wear these. Great fit, comfortable beyond belief and half the price

customer_reviews.text: Shoes were great. However, the regular size I always use felt very tight. I had to return them. However, they looked great and weighed decently. Not too heavy. If it were not so tight and narrow, I would have kept them.

customer_reviews.title: Probably the most comfortable shoe I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Probably the most comfortable shoe I've owned. However, they do run small. Had to return a pair of 9's. Replaced with 9.5's and they fit perfectly. One star taken away for a minor quality control issue.

customer_reviews.title: Five monthes shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is light and comfortable. But Surprisingly, it lasted only 5 monthes. As shown in attached pictures, it had defects in stitches and bonding. I am an office worker so do not walk that much. So Very disappointing!!

customer_reviews.title: but they are very comfortable and look good

customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are like walking on air. Love the fit and feel under my feet. I really have a size 9 foot but reading reviews they said they run small so I went with a 9.5 and they appear to actually run a little small so the size 9.5 work.

customer_reviews.text: I bought my husband two pairs of these and he loves them. He said they are the most comfortable shoes he's ever owned.

customer_reviews.text: Love the look and lightness of the shoe. Very cushiony. Only problem I had is that it caused soreness and pain in my left foot instep.

customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for me. I walk on concrete 15 hours a day and my feet don't kill me at the end of the day.

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Go Run 400 Trainers, Black Black, 7.5 UK 42 EU
product_meta.description: Skechers gorun 400; - generate is a well-cushioned, lightweight trainer perfect for a variety of workouts in and out of the gym. The responsive 5Gen; cushioning midsole and a breathable mesh upper offer an incredibly responsive workout shoe.
